apply.title: Apply
apply.description: Academy students are given an opportunity to be immersed in a professional two-month course for the testing beginners, build their competence through trainings and individual or groups assignments.

admission.title: Pass the admission
admission.description: Best candidates will be offered a paid internship for the Academy period to work on the real projects with our development teams. In parallel they are expected to attend academy to develop their skills.

learn.title: Learn from the experts
learn.description: Students will discover all types of techniques: learn the foundations of testing, functional testing for web applications and API, foundations of non-functional testing and foundations for test automation.

company.title: Join the company
company.description: At the end of term all students will receive a certificate of completion the Sourcery academy for Testers. Top graduates will be invited for an interview to become a Junior Test Engineer.
